attrFillColor.name: fill_color
attrFillColor.label: fill color
attrFillColor.comment: Default color, within the outlines and creases

attrOutlineColor.name: outline_color
attrOutlineColor.label: outline color
attrOutlineColor.comment: Outlines are silhouettes of the geometry

attrCreaseColor.name: crease_color
attrCreaseColor.label: crease color
attrCreaseColor.comment: Creases are sharp edges like corners in the geometry.

attrOutlineThreshold.name: outline_threshold
attrOutlineThreshold.label: outline threshold
attrOutlineThreshold.comment: In most cases, the shader would trace an outline of a model well when this threshold is zero.

attrOutlineScale.name: outline_scale
attrOutlineScale.label: outline scale
attrOutlineScale.comment: This attribute controls the thickness of outlines.

attrCreaseThreshold.name: crease_threshold
attrCreaseThreshold.label: crease threshold
attrCreaseThreshold.comment: This attribute sets the threshold angle (in degree units) to draw creases. The more the threshold angle is, the less the creases are traced.

attrCreaseScale.name: crease_scale
attrCreaseScale.label: crease scale
attrCreaseScale.comment: This attribute controls the thickness of creases.
